attributes.additional_details: Takings are at breaking point while trying to pay bills and keep staff employed, it's become an impossible situation. We need government support now!
attributes.background: Hospitality is dying! We need help NOW! You need to provide proper financial help in order for the industry to survive this situation. With the new Tier system telling hospitality to stay open while forcing the country to not socialise indoors, the footfall for most business is down to 30%.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give further financial support to the Events and Hospitality industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329985

'Take Out to Help Out' Scheme to Save our Hospitality Industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561723

Provide additional support to pubs, restaurants and all hospitality sectors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552314

Since you started your petition the Government has also announced business support grants for businesses that are required to close due to Covid-19 restrictions: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/closing-certain-businesses-and-venues-in-england#business-support
